trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of search in an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchExpression" /> 類別執行個體中的搜尋類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchExpression> filter option uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchType> enumeration when it performs a string comparison.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchExpression>篩選選項會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchType>列舉執行字串比較時。

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchExpression.SearchType%2A> property to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchType> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchExpression.SearchType%2A>屬性設為其中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchType>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use markup to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchExpression> filter option to the StartsWith value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchType.StartsWith> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用標記來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchExpression>篩選選項的 StartsWith 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.SearchType.StartsWith>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a search should determine whether the search string matches a string anywhere in a field.
trans-unit.target: 表示搜尋必須判斷搜尋字串是否符合欄位中任何位置的字串。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a search should determine whether the search string matches a string at the end of a field.
trans-unit.target: 指出搜尋必須判斷搜尋字串是否符合欄位尾端中的字串。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a search should determine whether the search string matches a string at the beginning of a field.
trans-unit.target: 表示搜尋必須判斷搜尋字串是否符合欄位開頭的字串。
